item.title: About - v24 - 1
item.dc:creator: brandexponents
item.content:encoded:
[tatsu_section bg_color= "" bg_repeat= "repeat" bg_attachment= "scroll" bg_position= "top left" bg_animation= "none" border_color= "" bg_video_mp4_src= "" bg_video_ogg_src= "" bg_video_webm_src= "" overlay_color= "" section_id= "" section_class= "" section_title= "" full_screen_header_scheme= "background--light" padding= "120px 3% 120px 3%" border= "0px 0px px 0px"][tatsu_row layout= "1/1"][tatsu_column layout= "1/1"][tatsu_text max_width= "" wrap_alignment= "left" animation_type= "fadeIn"]

ABOUT

[/tatsu_text][tatsu_text max_width= "85" wrap_alignment= "left" animation_type= "fadeIn"]I am Michael Doe and I am a fashion photographer based out of Paris, who loves to click, cook & travel.  Proin facilisis varius nunc. Curabitur eros risus, ultrices et dui ut, luctus accumsan nibh. Fusce convallis sapien placerat tellus suscipit vehicula. Ea mei nostrum imperdiet deterruisset, mei ludus efficiendi ei. Sea summo mazim ex, ea errem eleifend definitionem vim. Ut nec hinc dolor possim. An eros argumentum vel, elit diceret duo eu, quo et aliquid ornatus delicatissimi. Proin eu diam lorem, id scelerisque sapien. In accumsan metus at magna vehicula placerat tempor varius ipsum.[/tatsu_text][/tatsu_column][/tatsu_row][tatsu_row column_spacing= "" row_id= "" row_class= "" equal_height_columns= "0" full_width= "0" gutter= "medium" layout= "1/3+1/3+1/3"][tatsu_column layout= "1/3"][tatsu_divider height= "1" width= "100" color= "#dfdfdf" units= "%"][/tatsu_divider][tatsu_text max_width= "" wrap_alignment= "center" animation_type= "fadeIn"]
Clients
Namo, Wynn, Vogue, Beyonce, Nike, Boss, Espn[/tatsu_text][/tatsu_column][tatsu_column layout= "1/3"][tatsu_divider height= "1" width= "100" color= "#dfdfdf" units= "%"][/tatsu_divider][tatsu_text max_width= "" wrap_alignment= "center" animation_type= "fadeIn"]
Education
National Institute of Fashion & Technology, Paris, France. 2008-09[/tatsu_text][/tatsu_column][tatsu_column layout= "1/3"][tatsu_divider height= "1" width= "100" color= "#dfdfdf" units= "%"][/tatsu_divider][tatsu_text max_width= "" wrap_alignment= "center" animation_type= "fadeIn"]

item.title: About - v24 - 2
item.dc:creator: brandexponents
item.content:encoded:
[tatsu_section bg_color= "" bg_image= "http://brandexponents.com/oshine-lite/v24/wp-content/uploads/sites/27/2016/07/oshine-v24-2.jpg" bg_repeat= "no-repeat" bg_attachment= "scroll" bg_position= "center center" bg_stretch= "1" bg_animation= "none" border_color= "" bg_video_mp4_src= "" bg_video_ogg_src= "" bg_video_webm_src= "" bg_overlay= "1" overlay_color= "rgba(0,0,0,0.5)" section_id= "" section_class= "" section_title= "" full_screen= "1" full_screen_header_scheme= "background--light" padding= "90px 0% 90px 0%" bg_size= "cover" border= "0px 0px px 0px"][tatsu_row layout= "1/1"][tatsu_column layout= "1/1"][tatsu_text max_width= "" wrap_alignment= "left" animation_type= "fadeIn"]
FASHION  -  LIFESTYLE - WEDDINGS

MICHAEL DOE

[/tatsu_text][tatsu_text max_width= "60" wrap_alignment= "center" animation_type= "fadeIn"]

I am Michael Doe and I am a fashion photographer based out of Paris, who loves to click, cook & travel.  Proin facilisis varius nunc. Curabitur eros risus, ultrices et dui ut, luctus accumsan nibh. Fusce convallis sapien placerat tellus suscipit vehicula.

Ea mei nostrum imperdiet deterruisset, mei ludus efficiendi ei. Sea summo mazim ex, ea errem eleifend definitionem vim. Ut nec hinc dolor possim. An eros argumentum vel, elit diceret duo eu, quo et aliquid ornatus delicatissimi. Proin eu diam lorem, id scelerisque sapien. In accumsan metus at magna vehicula placerat tempor varius ipsum.

[/tatsu_text][/tatsu_column][/tatsu_row][tatsu_row layout= "1/1"][tatsu_column layout= "1/1"][tatsu_text max_width= "60" wrap_alignment= "center" animation_type= "fadeIn"]

MICHAEL DOE

I am Michael Doe and I am a fashion photographer based out of Paris, who loves to click, cook & travel.  Proin facilisis varius nunc. Curabitur eros risus, ultrices et dui ut, luctus accumsan nibh. Fusce convallis sapien placerat tellus suscipit vehicula.
